title: Local idiot writes code
description: A man who has never worked as a consultant i doing a code test
body: The story begins with a man who has worked for a year at a product startup company has taken on a challenge to write a code test for a company called Rhyme and the goal is to ensure that the guy delievers on his promises that he is a developer who is both creative and skilled in his profession as a full stack developer
author: Dimitri Gharam
